title: Emerald Radiance Grand Haaram Necklace Set
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This stunning Grand Haaram features a multi-layered design meticulously handcrafted with intricate diamond settings. Pear-shaped emeralds are elegantly interspersed throughout the necklace, culminating in a statement emerald pendant. Adorned with dangling freshwater pearls, this piece exudes regal charm. Traditional 'Gutti Poosalu' inspired pearl drops add a touch of Telugu heritage. The diamond setting showcases exceptional craftsmanship, providing maximum sparkle and brilliance.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaha)
and significant family celebrations. Ideal for Seemantham
or any occasion demanding an exquisite statement piece.
description: This Grand Haaram is a true heirloom piece. It combines the timeless elegance of traditional South Indian design with the modern brilliance of diamonds. The exquisite emeralds, sourced from trusted mines, add a touch of sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. This necklace is a testament to the skill and artistry of our master craftsmen.
